ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We would like to thank our librarians Beatrice Minder and Doris Kopp for their assistance with developing the search strategy and Christopher Ritter for editorial assistance. We would like to give special thanks to the MeSH Consortium Teamâ€”James Hargreaves (MeSH Consortium Director) as well as the IeDEA Collaboration (International Epidemiologic Database to evaluate AIDS).

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: No funding has been received for this protocol; it was funded by intramural funds. FV received support from the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation. The funders had no role in study conception or design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish or preparation of the review.
